alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 07 at 1:28AM CST until March 07 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Greene County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Craighead County in eastern Arkansas... Northwestern Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Dunklin County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 200 AM CST. * At 128 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Paragould, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Paragould, Manila, Bono, Lake City, Leachville, Senath, Brookland, Monette, Marmaduke, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Lake Frierson State Park, Oak Grove Heights, Cardwell, Arbyrd, Beech Grove, Walcott, Black Oak, Jolliff Store and Delfore. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for eastern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 AM CST for eastern Arkansas...and southeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for eastern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 AM CST for eastern Arkansas...and southeastern Missouri.
